mutants.code:
import re

def get_unique_words(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence)
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    words = sentence.split()
    unique_words = set(words)
    return list(unique_words)

import re

def get_unique_words(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', sentence)
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    words = sentence.split()
    unique_words = set(words)
    return list(unique_words)
